item.title: Bachelor
item.description: Bachelor Degree Exams Mathematical analysis 1 Mathematical analysis 2 Mathematical analysis 3 Astronomy 1 (sperical astronomy, coordinates, …) Astronomy 2 (observational astronomy, photometry, …) Historical astronomy Physics 1 Physics 2 Physics 3 Physics lab 1 Physics lab 2 Geometry Computer science Scientific English Descriptive statistics Astrophysics 1 (Galactic masses, local standard of rest, velocities, observations, …) Astrophysics 2 (A: spectroscopy, B: stellar structure) Chemistry 1 Chemistry 2 Analytical mechanics Complementary astrophysics Cosmology Plasma physics fundamentals Statistical inference 1B Principles of quantum mechanics Principles of (special) relativity Digital data analysis lab.
